name: European Intermediation
membership: Member of the Board of Cercle des Délégués Permanents Français (Brussels)
goal:
EU issues management and reputation management services.

Political mapping, policy monitoring, institutional outreach contact programmes and European media relation services to businesses and trade associations.

Training and coaching on EU activity.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Culture, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Financial services policy (banking, insurance, fiancial markets), digital economy policy (telecoms, data privacy, internet), media policy (governance, competition).
